name: Totally Free website only on Fiverr by drquochoai
body:
# INTRODUCTION:
- About me: I'm drquochoai or bsquochoai, i'm a medical student in Viet Nam, i'm good at helping people. My best talent is creating website, coding and designing. You'll know more about me in the WHAT I WILL DO section below.
- Aim of this gig: You don't know how to create a new website, you don't know how can a website work, you don't know how to start now. But you like the beauti of a website, you like the convinient of having a website. And right now, you want to have your own website or you want to have a website for store memories of your family, create a persional website, online store, Newspaper, Magazine, Musice, Free online film, s..s.... websites.
WHAT I WILL DO:
I'll create a new wordpress site for you, that include:
- FREE FAST AND GRADUATED HOSTING, he will never die, the uptime is 99,99%. And you can upgrade to the paid version anytime if you want more advance, but i still advise you to using the free hosting if your website traffice under 10.000 views a day. That's free 9.99Gb diskspace and 99.99Gb of bandwiths/month. That's to much for your starting!
- FREE TOP DOMAIN NAME:
  ++ You can select one or total 4 free top domains from below:
			yourname.TK (.thank you)
			yourname.GA (.good advise)
			yourname.CF (.coffee)
			yourname.ML (.menlly)
	THOSE DOMAIN IS TOTAL FREE FOR LIFE, you don't need anything else to get those. Just only one of your FAKE or UNFAKE email address!
	You can register all of those 4 domains at same time, and that's TOTAL FREE.
	I can manager those domain for you, or you can do it by yourself, of course i will show you how to do that by yourself. Just don't worry any thing, i can create for you, it's mean that i can teach you how to do it by yourself.
	I can transfer those domains to you or your friends if you like anytime or if one unbeautiful day you don't believe in me anymore.
	++ Or you can provide me your exist domain, i'll bind the free hosting to your domain and start making a beautifull wordpress website for you.
	++ If in the future you want to change the domain of your site to the most popular domain like .COM, .NET, .ORG ,..... that's easy for me to show you step by step how to do that in under 30 minutes by yourself.
- After those, I'M NOT JUST CREATING A NEW FREE WORDPRESS SITE FOR YOU, but i also help you to do more beautiful things for your website design and manager your website:
	+ I will install a beautiful theme for your website (depend on what your website type), THEN i'll help you to fix some issue of the display and the design of that theme, create the logo of yoursite, create beautiful poster, ...
	+ I will help you to have the best beautiful front page of your site. That anyone see your site just love and want to have it from the first look.
	+ I will help you to install some advanced plugin that make your site run faster, and more effective, and ofcourse SEO (search engine optimize) is include. I'll store your website images and medias in Google drive, that make your site runfaster.
	+ I will help you to add more advance elements to your site that make your visitors love your site much and comeback more frequently: Subcriber box, Email to them when something posted in yoursite, Facebook like button, FB share, FB comment, G+, Twitter, Chat plugin,...
	+ I WILL HELP YOU TO INSTALL ALL BEST PLUGIN IN THE WORLD OF WORDPRESS AT THIS TIME LIKE: All In One SEO Pack, Adsense, Akismet, Amazon, Aweber, Clickbank, Contact Form 7, Facebook, Getresponse, Gravity Forms, Instagram, LinkedIn, Mailchimp, OpenCart, Paypal, Twitter, Vimeo, WooCommerce, WordPress, SEO By Yoast, Youtube, W3 Total Cache,..... AND MORE AND MORE MORE MORE
	+ I PROMISE THAT I WILL HELP YOU TO PARADIS UNTIL YOUR WEBSITE IS DONE !
	+ I will teach you to auto increase you facebook page likes if you want to have a facebook page for your website. Auto post your post to Facebook,...
	+ I will help you to make a fast login system by Google, Twitter, Facebook, Linkedin, VK.com,.. account.
	+ And many many more, if i can help you, i will do it all my best.
- IF YOU HAVE EXIST WEBSITE AND YOU WANT ME TO HELP YOU to FIX, UPGRADE, Cloning, Migration, Customization new face, or find and fix the Security, i can help you, just buy this gigs.
- IF you don't want to paid money for the hosting company every 3 month, i can help you to move your exist website to a new free hosting (also move your domain too), and you won't worry a bout the money you lost every month, but your website still run as fast as normal. ONLY under 2 days!
- NOTE:
	+ I can help you to the step of installed a beautiful theme for your website.
	+ Then i'll install some good plugin for you website, and i'll teach you how to use it.
	+ ALL things after that, i and you will do it ogether for you to understand how your website work. I can not do anything for you, if i do that, then i will have to do that from all the rest of my life for you. You will still don't know anything about website. Just active your hands and your mind, make it yourself and you will love what you have've done, you will respect my efforts to help you. And when you know how your website work, you will not depend on me any more, you can do anything with your website. That's so greate!!!!!!
	+ The price is only $5 from Fiverr for me to do all thing i mention above, but if you want to donate me, i really love you!
- CONTACT:
	+ Skype: drquochoai
	+ Email: drquochoai@gmail.com
	+ I also help you via Teamviewer if need.
	+ I'll create a video tutorials for you if need.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
